generatedSources.name: #utility.yul

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title MicropaymentChannel
 @notice A simple micropayment channel contract demonstrating off-chain signatures.
 Flow:
 - Sender deploys contract with initial ETH, sets receiver and expiration.
 - Off-chain: Sender signs messages of form (contract_address, amount).
 - Receiver uses claim(...) with a valid signature to retrieve funds.
 - If time expires, sender can reclaim the remaining funds.

claim(uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32).details: Receiver calls claim with amount and signed message from sender

params.amount: The amount that the sender agreed off-chain
params.v: ,r,s Signature components from sender's signed message

userdoc.notice: A simple micropayment channel contract demonstrating off-chain signatures. Flow: - Sender deploys contract with initial ETH, sets receiver and expiration. - Off-chain: Sender signs messages of form (contract_address, amount). - Receiver uses claim(...) with a valid signature to retrieve funds. - If time expires, sender can reclaim the remaining funds.
